name: FastMissile
description:
This is a simple game developed for My First Game Jam. I hope you enjoy the game.

To play is to easy. The controls are the arrows keys, enter and space bar.

Some tips:

To acelerate, press the up arrow. If you release the key, you will fell down and you will die.

To turn right or left, just press the correspondent key, right or left.

You can shot too. Yes, press the space bar to shot. If the shot meet with the missiles, they will be destroy. Your score will be increased. Every missile you destroy, the score increase 50 points.

And I thinks that's is all abouts the game.

Obviously, the idea of the game not is mine, but I wanted recreate  my version.

If you like the game, you can donate me through PAYPAL.
